headline: Ask HN: How would one start doing TDD “properly”?
description: I was reading today a small rant by GeePaw (https://twitter.com/GeePawHill/status/1558159024520151041) and made me think that I don't feel I ever a) did TDD the "right way" b) ever found a good resource on how to do it. For people that to it, what would you recommend to your younger self?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何开始 "正确地 "做TDD？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何開始 "正確地 "做TDD？
description_zh-Hans: 我今天读了GeePaw(https://twitter.com/GeePawHill/status/1558159024520151041)的一篇小文章，让我觉得我从来没有：a)以"正确的方式做TDD；b)找到过关于如何做的好资源。对于那些想做TDD的人，你会向你的年轻人推荐什么？
description_zh-Hant: 我今天讀了GeePaw(https://twitter.com/GeePawHill/status/1558159024520151041)的一篇小文章，讓我覺得我從來沒有：a)以"正確的方式做TDD；b)找到過關於如何做的好資源。對於那些想做TDD的人，你會向你的年輕人推薦什麼？
